explanation: [0-0] A woman sits in front of a bed, smiling with a yellow glue stick in her left hand, holding her index finger to her lips. Behind her, a man is sleeping on the bed.

[0-8] The woman leans forward slightly, raises her left index finger to her lips, then points to the sleeping man. She turns back, facing forward, holding the glue stick in her left hand and a bunch of brown hair in her right, smiling happily as she shakes both hands up and down. The scene switches to her holding the opened glue stick, playfully sticking out her tongue. She raises her right arm and applies glue to her right armpit, then sticks a lock of hair there, patting it to secure it. She then applies glue to her left armpit and sticks another lock of hair there.

[14-24] The scene switches to her lying on the bed next to the sleeping man. She raises her right arm, resting her head on it, revealing the hair stuck in her armpit, and looks at the man. She adjusts the hair in her armpit and moves closer to the man, causing the hair to touch his nose. The man turns his head slightly left, then right, sniffing the hair, and then licks it, frowning. The woman watches him, holding back laughter.

[24-29] The man covers his nose with his right hand, then lowers it and sniffs his armpit again, slowly opening his eyes and sitting up slightly. Seeing the woman with hair stuck to her chin, chest, and armpits, he puckers his lips to kiss her, but is startled and retreats, covering his face.
